4.eng-name: The Book On The Mosques And The Congregations

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'The most burdensome prayers for the hypocrites are the 'Isha' prayer and the Fajr prayer. If only they knew what (reward) there is in them, they would come to them even if they had to crawl

chapter.ara-name: باب صَلاَةِ الْعِشَاءِ وَالْفَجْرِ فِي جَمَاعَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: Performing The 'Isha' And Fajr Prayers In Congregation
